itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Black Stone Crystal that can be fused into Shoes sockets. 
- Item effect: Knockback/Floating Resistance +5%
â€» This magic crystal has high chance of getting shattered on death.
- Transfusion can be performed by the Black Spirit.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.
